attributes.action: Spend the money intended on bidding for the 2018 world cup on finishing the national football centre of excellence instead
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: it is quite ironic that this government and Football association would rather host a world cup than win one. i propose that the government uses the money intended for the world cup bid to instead finish and run the planned national centre of football excellence and show the true commitment to helping the young people of this country achieve excellence rather than fill the pockets of the ungrateful and major companies who will spend the money overseas
